class controllers.ControllerRequests.ControllerRequests(server, user)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Class of thread responsible for handling incoming requests of the user

closeConnection() → None¶

Responsible for stop the thread :returns: None

parseRequest(request) → None¶

Responsible for checking the request type and calling the appropriate method :param request: A Request object :returns: None

run() → None¶

Responsible for running the thread :returns: None
